name: OneRoom
description:
You log in to a chatroom. Some of the members have just completed a game jam and want your opinion on their work. What could go wrong?

The original OneRoom is a game created for Ludum Dare 37, "One Room." I produced the code, art, and audio in 48 hours. Here's the Ludum Dare entry page! I have recently added an improved Post-Jam version of the game (do not rate this for Ludum Dare).

** WARNING: ONEROOM CONTAINS STRONG LANGUAGE AND IT MAY NOT BE SUITABLE FOR CHILDREN. **

This game takes around 10 minutes to complete. It's a complete narrative experience, so stick around until the end!

Tools Used:

  • Unity3D
  • Photoshop
  • Audacity
  • Garage Band
  • BFXR
